name: Canecom
description:
Canecom is a privately held development firm that focuses on mobile application development for various platforms, such as iOS, Android and Windows Phone.
We are professionals who simply love what they do. With more than 6 years of mobile app development experience, our team is ready to meet any of your requests and turn your world-changing ideas into working mobile applications.
Visit our blog where you can find information on our on-going projects and an inside look into our workflow as well; the way we work, solve problems, and come up with ideas.
